    Security incident management in Azure Sentinel - Describe incident management

    »

    1. Which Azure Sentinel component is used to generate alerts?

      Incidents

      Analytic rules

      Data connectors

      Events


    2. What is the primary goal of incident management in Sentinel?

      Understand the state of security health in Microsoft Azure.

      Track and manage issues in Azure.

      Track and resolve security issues across your organization’s environment.

      Manage security roles in your environment.
